entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Estevan Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:18 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Point 3:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 8.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 40 to 50 mm except 70 mm near Port Renfrew. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections near noon. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming southeast 30 near midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
